Game should have been over at this point because curfew law made another inning impossible, but was allowed to continue until 6:59. Possibly out of spite, Giants Mgr Durocher had Behrman throw two wide balls to Kiner, who had 49 homers. Durocher may have thought inning would not count if not finished.
Hansen entered with 2-0 count, finished the IW, then was relieved by Zabala.
Game ended due to Pennsylania curfew law
